AboutPage.title: Hi, I'm Vladyslav Kobiakov
AboutPage.intro: Software Engineer & Algo-Trading Enthusiast with 4 years of market experience.
AboutPage.description: I bridge the gap between financial markets and modern web technologies. My background in competitive rowing (7 years) instilled a level of discipline and endurance that I now apply to building complex AI-driven systems. From Information Processing & Software Engineering to developing high-frequency trading bots, I focus on performance, reliability, and scale.

1.q: What kind of bots do you build?
1.a: I specialize in AI-powered Telegram agents, high-frequency trading bots for Crypto/Forex, and automated data processing scripts.

2.q: Do you work with existing teams?
2.a: Yes. I can act as a solo developer or integrate into your technical team to handle AI/Algo components.

3.a: I am fluent in English, German, Russian, and Ukrainian, facilitating smooth communication for international projects.
